definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: It requires everyone to wear formal clothes from Monday to Friday.
sentences.chinese: 规定要求所有人从周一都周五必须穿正装。

sentences.english: You should either wear a formal suit or - if you want to be very proper - a morning suit.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿正装，或者如果你想更合适就穿西服。

sentences.english: If I were you, I’d dress up and be well-mannered.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是你，我会穿正装并表现得彬彬有礼。

sentences.english: We got up early, put on our suits and prepared to meet the bride.
sentences.chinese: 一早起来，我们两个都换了正装，准备去接新娘。

sentences.english: The invitation specified that the dress code would be formal, so I donned my tuxedo.
sentences.chinese: 请柬规定要着正装，于是我穿上了燕尾服。

sentences.english: The respected Gungan dressed in the formal clothes of a Rep, complete with hood and robes.
sentences.chinese: 这位可敬的冈根人身着配有长袍和兜帽的议事正装。

sentences.english: You eventually want to own three suits.
sentences.chinese: 你最终要拥有三套正装。

sentences.english: Boys should wear collared shirts and dress pants.
sentences.chinese: 男生要穿有领衬衫和正装长裤。

sentences.english: If I were you, I'd dress up and be well-mannered.
sentences.chinese: 我是你，我会穿正装并得彬彬有礼。

sentences.english: If I were him, I'd dress up and be well-mannered.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是他，我会穿正装并表现得彬彬有礼。
沃克尔设计的白色正装。

sentences.english: I have a suit, of course, for weddings and funerals.
sentences.chinese: 我当然有正装，婚丧的时候穿的。

sentences.english: Suits are made of wool or cotton.
sentences.chinese: 正装的质地是毛或者棉。

sentences.english: Women should wear a suit or other clothing suitable for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 女士则应该穿正装或者和场合相符的衣服。

sentences.english: Dressing for dinner emphasized the importance of family and healthy food.
sentences.chinese: 正装表明你对此家庭和健康食品的重视。

sentences.english: Today, my clothes, including my formal dress, smell of cat urine.
sentences.chinese: 今天我发现我所有衣服包括正装都一股猫尿味。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
